name: Techniday
tag_list: computer-support, software-support, computer-tech-support, tech-support, fix-computer, speedup-computer, repair-computer, repair-pc, fix-computer-issues, install-antivirus, computer-problem, fix-computer-problem
overview:
Techniday is a customer-driven computer support services company. Techniday helps customers with their computers and software.

Below are the features of the services provided by Techniday :

  • Computer Software Troubleshooting and Repair
  • PC Tune Up/Clean Up, Speed Improvement
  • Virus/Spyware Removal
  • Windows Install or Upgrade Support
  • Data recovery/ Backup Services
  • Printer, Scanner and Other Hardware Support
  • Modem, Wi-Fi router and internet Setup and Support
  • Support for all brands of Desktops/Laptops
  • Email / Yahoo/ Gmail / Outlook Support
  • Mac OS Based Device Support
  • 24/7 Support - 365 days a year

We work round the clock, providing free computer diagnostics and further support plans to meet each customer’s needs. All our technicians are very well qualified and also certified with Microsoft/Cisco.

We are authorized resellers of AVG, BitDefender, Norton and Kaspersky Antivirus and can instantly help install these software onto the customer’s PC to fix any virus related issues
